p.k: February of 1913. Mexico City is a nest of traitors that conspire against Francisco Madero, first president of the Mexican revolution. The smell of a pronouncement is in the air. Based on the best seller by Paco Ignacio Taibo II "Temporada de Zopilotes" (Zopilotes's season) gets deep in, narrating the facts of the "Decena tr√°gica" ( tragic ten) that ended up with the assassination of president Francisco Madero.
